helpArticles.question: Updating your email when locked out of the app

answer.answer:
To update your email address and get access to your account, please: 

1. Email us at <help@monzo.com>.

2. In the email, please include:

‚úâÔ∏è Your old email address
‚úâÔ∏è Your new email address
üì± Your phone number
üì∏ A selfie photo holding up your photo ID so we can verify your identity 

3. Sit tight ‚Äì we'll get back to you as soon as we've updated your details.

4. When you log back in using your old email, you'll be asked to enter your PIN for security reasons.

helpArticles.question: I'm getting a 'User Authentication' message when I try to log in

answer.answer:
Getting 'User Authentication Required' when trying to log in to your app?

Customers often get this message when they've recently changed their phone, or restored it from a backup using iCloud. 

iCloud usually keep all of your accounts logged in, but as a bank we have tighter security than other apps so it doesn't quite work as expected.

Please try re-installing your app to login to Monzo.

helpArticles.question: The link you sent me to log into my account isn't working

answer.answer:
There's a few quick fixes for when your log in link doesn't seem to work. We'd suggest:

1. Deleting all the log in emails you've received from Monzo in the past, and request a new one. If you press the 'send magic link' button several times, it's likely that you're trying to log in using an expired link. 

2. Try accessing your email using alternative means. For example, if you're trying to tap the link using your phone's 'Mail' app, try using a web browser such as Chrome or Safari to access your email this way instead. 

3. If neither of the above options work, please contact us at help@monzo.com and we'll do our best to help!

helpArticles.question: I still haven't received a log in email

answer.answer:
Before contacting our support channels, we'd encourage you to:

1. Wait a few minutes for this email to arrive. They're usually pretty fast, but can sometimes take a few minutes.

2. Check your 'Spam' and 'Junk' folders to see if the link has been sent there.

3. Double check that you entered the correct email address before requesting the link, and that you're searching the right inbox.

If the log in email still isn't appearing, please send us an email at help@monzo.com and we'll follow this up! It's possible that the server we use to send our emails may be causing the trouble.

helpArticles.question: I can't remember which email address I used to sign up with Monzo

answer.answer:
Not a problem! If you've got multiple emails, it can often be hard remembering which you used to sign up with. 

1. Search your 'Spam' and 'Junk' folders to see if we've emailed you before. It's likely that the email we reached out to, is the email connected to your account. 

2. Can't find any previous email history with us? Use the 'Search' function on your email provider to search 'Monzo' and see what you find. 

3. Still confident you're entering the right email, and you've tried the above without much success? Please email us at help@monzo.com

helpArticles.question: I'm getting an error message when I try to log in

answer.answer:
To update your email and get access to your account again, please: 
It sounds like you might be trying to log in using an old or incorrect email address, different to the one registered to your account. 

To try logging in again, please:

1. Delete and reinstall your Monzo App from the App or Google Play Store

2. Log back in using the correct details

* We'll send a magic link to your email. All you need to do is tap on the link to get access to your app again.

helpArticles.question: I have a Microsoft email address but haven't received a log in email

answer.answer:
I'm really sorry to hear about the trouble you're having with logging in.

Can you try the following steps please:

- Check your junk/spam folders. If the link is there it's possible you need to mark the email as safe or move it to your inbox so the magic link can be accessed.
- If there's nothing there then, please whitelist emails from "monzomail.com" (the domain we send login emails from). This link [here](https://support.office.com/en-gb/article/block-senders-or-unblock-senders-in-outlook-on-the-web-9bf812d4-6995-4d19-901a-76d6e26939b0) specifically the subheading **Stop messages from going into your junk folder** should provide helpful instructions on how to do this.
- After whitelisting the address, please request a new magic link.

If the above still doesn't work, please can you let us know if you have another non-Microsoft email address you can use e.g. Gmail, iCloud or something else? Then send through a selfie of you holding your photo ID so that we can verify your identity and update your email address.

Thanks!
